name: Release Drafter
on:
  pull_request:
    types: [closed]
    branches:
      - production
jobs:
  update_release_draft:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout The PR
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Check Version
        id: check_version
        run: kotlinc -script .github/scripts/auto_release_adder.kts "${{ github.event.pull_request.body }}"

      - name: Create Version Tag
        id: create_version_tag
        run: |
          echo "RELEASE_VERSION=${{ steps.check_version.outputs.release_version }}
" >> $GITHUB_ENV

      - name: Create Release
        uses: release-drafter/release-drafter@v5
        with:
          config-name: auto-release-adder-config.yml
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.ACTION_TOKEN }}
          VERSION: ${{ env.RELEASE_VERSION }}
